group.div:
The Account structure template is a string/template that will be used when exporting to external Accounting System that requires specific structure for the accounts. Each name enclosed in {} will be replaced with the actual value from the document, every other text will be left as is.
Possible names that can be used in the template:
{num}: Invoice Number {pnum}: Parent Invoice Number {subcode}: Invoice Subcode {maincode_code}: Invoice Maincode.Code {type}: Invoice Type {issue_date}: Invoice Issue Date {pissue_date}: Parent Invoice Issue Date {due_date}: Invoice Due Date {op_date}: Accounting Operation Date {arch_num}: Accounting Archive Number {acc_user}: Accounting User ID {counterparty_name}: Counterparty Name {counterparty_reg_num}: Counterparty Registration Number {counterparty_short_num}: Counterparty Registration Number Last 4 Digits {counterparty_tax_num}: Counterparty Tax Number {counterparty_client_number}: Counterparty Client Number {currency}: Currency {currency_code}: Currency Code {exchange_rate_to_bgn}: Exchange Rate to BGN {content_maincode_code}: Content Row Maincode.Code {content_subtype}: Subtype {content_subtype_name}: Subtype Name {content_identifier}: Identifier {content_identifier_name}: Identifier Name {content_warehouse}: Warehouse {content_warehouse_name}: Warehouse Name {content_quantity}: Quantity {content_unit}: Unit for the particular content in BG(based on the unit of the identifier) {content_name}: Content Name {auto_vat_num}: Counterparty VAT Number auto-generated based on the counterparty country and EU status {auto_eik_num}: Counterparty EIK Number auto-generated based on the counterparty country and EU status
{trx_direction}: Cashflow Transaction Direction {trx_medium}: Cashflow Transaction Medium {trx_date}: Cashflow Transaction Date {trx_bank_account_iban}: Cashflow Transaction Bank Account IBAN {trx_bank_account_desc}: Cashflow Transaction Bank Account Description {trx_bank_account_ref_number}: Cashflow Transaction Bank Account Ref Number {trx_exchange_rate_to_bgn}: Cashflow Transaction Exchange Rate to BGN {trx_amount}: Cashflow Transaction Amount {trx_amount_bgn}: Cashflow Transaction Amount in BGN {trx_acc_archive_number}: Cashflow Transaction Accounting Archive Number {trx_acc_op_date}: Cashflow Transaction Accounting Operation Date {trx_accountant_id}: Cashflow Transaction Accounting Accountant ID
{trx_allocation_accounting_ref_number}: Cashflow Transaction Allocation Accounting Ref Number {trx_allocation_subtype_name}: Cashflow Transaction Allocation Subtype Name {trx_allocation_subtype}: Cashflow Transaction Allocation Subtype {trx_allocation_subcode}: Cashflow Transaction Allocation Subcode {trx_allocation_maincode_code}: Cashflow Transaction Allocation Maincode Code {trx_allocation_amount}: Cashflow Transaction Allocation Amount {trx_allocation_amount_bgn}: Cashflow Transaction Allocation Amount in BGN {trx_allocation_currency_code}: Cashflow Transaction Allocation Currency Code {trx_allocation_currency_name}: Cashflow Transaction Allocation Currency Name {trx_allocation_accounting_ref_number}: Cashflow Accounting RefNumber used in the allocation
The followng exmaple:
2$Производствен цех#{content_subtype}${content_subtype_name}#{subcode}
Will be replaced with something like:
2$Производствен цех#100#Разходи основни материали#BRK.240180
